fields.title: 2FA Enforced on Organization
fields.description: Checks if Two-Factor Authentication is required for all members.

fields.title: Main Branch Protection
fields.description: Ensures the main/master branch has protection rules enabled.

fields.title: Missing Documentation
fields.description: Checks if the repository has a README.md file.

fields.title: CIS 1.4: Restrict Outside Collaborators
fields.description: Ensure there are no outside collaborators with access to the repository.

fields.title: CIS 4.4: Prevent Force Pushes
fields.description: Ensure force pushes are denied on the default branch.

fields.title: CIS 4.5: Prevent Branch Deletion
fields.description: Ensure deletion of the default branch is blocked.

fields.title: CIS 4.6: Require Status Checks
fields.description: Ensure status checks are required to pass before merging.

fields.title: GH-GOV-01: License File
fields.description: Ensure a LICENSE file exists in the repository.

fields.title: CIS 1.1: Enforce MFA
fields.description: Ensure multi-factor authentication is required for the organization.

fields.title: CIS 1.2: Stale Admin Access
fields.description: Ensure admins have logged in within the past 90 days.

fields.title: CIS 1.3: Excessive Owners
fields.description: Ensure organization has less than 3 owners.

fields.title: CIS 2.1: Secret Scanning
fields.description: Ensure secret scanning is enabled on the repository.

fields.title: CIS 2.2: Dependabot Enabled
fields.description: Ensure Dependabot security updates are enabled.

fields.title: CIS 2.5: Private Repo Visibility
fields.description: Ensure repositories are private (unless public intent).

fields.title: CIS 3.1: Signed Commits
fields.description: Ensure commit signing is required.

fields.title: CIS 4.1: Branch Protection
fields.description: Ensure metadata on branch protection is active.

fields.title: CIS 4.2: Require Code Reviews
fields.description: Ensure at least one approving review is required.

fields.title: CIS 4.3: Dismiss Stale Reviews
fields.description: Ensure stale reviews are dismissed on new pushes.

fields.title: CIS 4.5: Linear History
fields.description: Ensure linear history is enforced.

fields.title: CIS 5.1: CODEOWNERS File
fields.description: Ensure CODEOWNERS file is present.
